meta.project: Aegis Simulation Kit - Agent Smoke Test

objectives: Clone the Aegis Simulation Kit repo into the Agent workspace
Validate hello_world scenario and run JSON files
Return the report content and a PASS/FAIL summary

steps.desc: Use terminal to clone the repo
steps.done_when: Folder 'aegis-simulation-kit' exists and pwd is inside it

steps.desc: Validate hello_world scenario and run JSON files
steps.done_when: Validator returns success for both files

steps.desc: Run the hello_world simulation to generate the report
steps.done_when: examples/reports/hello_world_report.md exists with no Python traceback

steps.desc: Read the report and confirm required sections
steps.done_when: Report contains SUMMARY, WHAT I DID, ARTEFACTS, BLOCKERS, NEXT

steps.desc: Return report content and structured PASS/FAIL summary to the user
steps.done_when: User receives both the report text and a concise status block

deliverables.name: hello_world_report
deliverables.criteria: Contains SUMMARY, WHAT I DID, ARTEFACTS, BLOCKERS, NEXT

guardrails.ask_if: repo_url is unreachable or python scripts fail repeatedly
guardrails.abort_if: validator or simulation scripts cannot be run successfully after retries
